name: MyProgrammer
description:
MyProgrammer is a custom software development company specializing in Microsoft technologies. We provide web, mobile and database solutions, and specialize in ongoing maintenance and support. Founded by industry veteran Rob Carr in 1996, MyProgrammer partners with companies across the country to design and build innovative and scalable custom software. We've been mentioned in industry publications, including Understanding Computers, a leading college textbook.
To discuss your software project needs call Rob at (800) 984-6977. He will provide a free consultation and no-obligation estimate.
